function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased neighbour noise complaints during lockdown","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and quality of life due to increased exposure to noise","Mitigation":"Implement noise reduction measures and communication strategies with neighbours","Technologies":"Noise-canceling headphones, soundproofing materials, mediation apps","People":"Residential communities, individuals living in close proximity to neighbours","Owner":"Individuals, community organizations, local authorities"},{"Description":"Substantial increase in time spent on entertainment during lockdown","Impact":"Potential increase in sedentary behavior and indoor air pollution from increased use of home appliances","Mitigation":"Promote outdoor activities, encourage physical exercise, and provide information on indoor air quality management","Technologies":"Smart home devices for air quality monitoring, indoor exercise equipment, educational materials on healthy lifestyle choices","People":"General public, individuals spending more time indoors","Owner":"Health organizations, local authorities, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Rise in DIY and home repairs during lockdown","Impact":"Potential increase in airborne noise and disturbance due to increased home maintenance activities","Mitigation":"Provide guidance on noise reduction in DIY projects, promote consideration for neighbours when conducting home repairs","Technologies":"Quiet power tools, noise reduction materials, community DIY guidelines","People":"Individuals engaging in DIY and home maintenance, neighbours affected by noise","Owner":"Local authorities, community groups, DIY enthusiasts"}]}
